column5: i am looking for a really good outpost camp with amazing fishing for a reasonable price.I am interested in catching lake trout,walleye.specks,northern pike,bass.the main species being walleye,trout and pike.if anyone has stayed at a good outpost campo and had real good fishing i would love it if you could tell me where you went.
Check out Hawk Air.  Really good services and amazing fishing for the species you mentioned.
i'll second hawk air if you're willing to head up as far as wawa.  not many areas can beat wawa/white river for the species you've mentioned.
